Hi everyone,

I'm brand new to the game, having only played the demo before. I hope I can make some positive contributions to the community and have some fan with you guys.

Now for my question: I tried to add a signature and an avatar to my profile, but apparently I don't have the forum permissions for that. I bought the game through Steam, so maybe I'm using the wrong login here or do I have to PM someone asking for this kind of permission?

Anyway, thanks in advance for your help.

Welcome to the forums! Unfortunately, I do not know enough myself about the signatures (As you can see by the text under my name, and the pink field in my sig), but I'm sure you will find someone else with far more experience than I. I hope you enjoy your time here!
Welcome! You need at least 3 posts before you get those permissions.

Thanks mate!

I'll start spreading my ignorance around the forum till I get to do it.

Welcome to the forums!

The forums are handled by a different system than the Steam and KSP Stores; thus, it doesn't matter where you purchased the game, as your forum account is unrelated to either of those.

Since you're a new player, I'd highly recommend that you check out some of the tutorials found on the Drawing Board (link in my sig) if you run into any difficulties. A lot of the instructions might not make sense until you've given the missions a few tries, but it's very rewarding if you keep at it. Don't be afraid to post questions about building and flying your vehicles in the How To forums as well.

Happy landings!
